short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download embedded videos, bring back the bird logo, replace tweets and more. Lightweight and totally client-side.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you miss the blue bird logo? Do you want to download embedded videos from tweets with a single click? We got you covered!

This plugin adds a handful of gimmicks to the web version of Twitter, in order to make it even more satisfying. No third-party servers, everything is done locally, right on your browser. Your data are not stored, analysed or manipulated in any way -well, at least not by this extension. ;)
